name: Japan ETF Currency Hedged vs Unhedged Analysis
question: How much difference has currency hedging made for Japan ETF investments over the USD/JPY volatility cycles?
retailQuestion: Should I hedge currency risk when investing in Japanese stocks?
description: Compares the performance of currency-hedged vs unhedged Japan ETF investments (EWJ vs DXJ) over 12 years of USD/JPY fluctuations. Analyzes the impact of currency movements on returns, volatility, and the effectiveness of hedging during different currency cycles and Bank of Japan policy changes.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get 12+ years of EWJ and DXJ data for currency hedge comparison
Step 2: Get current Japan ETF market data for currency context
Step 3: Analyze currency impact on returns and calculate hedge effectiveness
Step 4: Backtest hedged vs unhedged strategies across currency cycles
Step 5: Evaluate when currency hedging adds value for international investing
